-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/augustunderground/plotly-hs#readme</a>
@package plotly-hs
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Internal Functions and Types for Plotly Plots in Haskell
module Graphics.Plotly.Internal

-- | Thanks Alan Zimmerman <a>https://gist.github.com/alanz/2465584</a>
omitNulls :: [Pair] -> [Pair]

-- | Internal Type Alias
type Script = ByteString

-- | Takes a Script and inserts it into the default HTML template
toHtml :: Script -> ByteString

-- | Layout Margins
data Margin
Margin :: !Int -> !Int -> !Int -> !Int -> Margin

-- | Left Margin
[$sel:l:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Right Margin
[$sel:r:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Bottom Margin
[$sel:b:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Top Margin
[$sel:t:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Layout for Plots
data Layout
Layout :: !String -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe BarMode -> !Int -> !Int -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Margin -> Layout

-- | Plot Title
[$sel:title:Layout] :: Layout -> !String

-- | X Axis Layout
[$sel:xaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Y Axis Layout
[$sel:yaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Bar Chart Layout
[$sel:barmode:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe BarMode

-- | Plot Height in Pixels
[$sel:height:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Plot Width in Pixels
[$sel:width:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Show a Legend
[$sel:showlegend:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Margins
[$sel:margin:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Margin

-- | Axis Type
data AxisType

-- | Linear Axis (default)
Linear :: AxisType

-- | Logarithmic Axis
Log :: AxisType

-- | Date Axis
Date :: AxisType

-- | Categorical Axis
Category :: AxisType

-- | Multi Category Axis (?)
MultiCategory :: AxisType

-- | Axis Layout
data Axis
Axis :: !String -> !Bool -> !Bool -> !AxisType -> Axis

-- | Axis Label
[$sel:title:Axis] :: Axis -> !String

-- | Enable Grid
[$sel:showGrid:Axis] :: Axis -> !Bool

-- | Enable Zero Line
[$sel:zeroLine:Axis] :: Axis -> !Bool

-- | Axis Type
[$sel:type':Axis] :: Axis -> !AxisType

-- | Parallel Coordinate Lines
data Line
Line :: !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe ColorScale -> ![Double] -> Line

-- | Show Color Bar
[$sel:showscale:Line] :: Line -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Reverse the Color Scale
[$sel:reversescale:Line] :: Line -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Color Scale
[$sel:colorscale:Line] :: Line -> !Maybe ColorScale

-- | Values represnting the color
[$sel:color:Line] :: Line -> ![Double]

-- | Marker Config
data Marker
Marker :: !Double -> !Symbol -> !Double -> Marker

-- | Marker Size
[$sel:size:Marker] :: Marker -> !Double

-- | Marker Symbol
[$sel:symbol:Marker] :: Marker -> !Symbol

-- | Marker Opacity
[$sel:opacity:Marker] :: Marker -> !Double

-- | Data Trace
data Trace
Trace :: !Maybe String -> !Maybe [Double] -> !Maybe [Double] -> !Maybe [Double] -> !Maybe Mode -> !Type -> !Maybe BarMode -> !Maybe XBins -> !Maybe Marker -> Trace

-- | Trace Name
[$sel:name:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe String

-- | X axis values
[$sel:x:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe [Double]

-- | Y axis values
[$sel:y:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe [Double]

-- | Z axis values
[$sel:z:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe [Double]

-- | Scatter Mode
[$sel:mode:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe Mode

-- | Plot Type
[$sel:type':Trace] :: Trace -> !Type

-- | Histogram Bar Mode
[$sel:barmode:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe BarMode

-- | Histogram Bins
[$sel:xbins:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe XBins

-- | Marker Configuration
[$sel:marker:Trace] :: Trace -> !Maybe Marker

-- | Heatmap Trace
data TraceH
TraceH :: ![[Double]] -> !Maybe [String] -> !Maybe [String] -> !Type -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe ColorScale -> TraceH

-- | Data Matrix
[$sel:z:TraceH] :: TraceH -> ![[Double]]

-- | Y labels
[$sel:x:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe [String]

-- | Y Labels
[$sel:y:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe [String]

-- | Heatmap
[$sel:type':TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Type

-- | Hover on Gaps
[$sel:hoverOnGaps:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Show scale Bar
[$sel:showScale:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Color Scale
[$sel:colorScale:TraceH] :: TraceH -> !Maybe ColorScale

-- | Surface Trace
data TraceS
TraceS :: !Maybe String -> ![[Double]] -> !Maybe [Double] -> !Maybe [Double] -> !Type -> !Maybe ColorScale -> TraceS

-- | Trace Name
[$sel:name:TraceS] :: TraceS -> !Maybe String

-- | Data Matrix
[$sel:z:TraceS] :: TraceS -> ![[Double]]

-- | Y labels
[$sel:x:TraceS] :: TraceS -> !Maybe [Double]

-- | Y Labels
[$sel:y:TraceS] :: TraceS -> !Maybe [Double]

-- | Surface
[$sel:type':TraceS] :: TraceS -> !Type

-- | Color Scale
[$sel:colorScale:TraceS] :: TraceS -> !Maybe ColorScale

-- | Parallel Coordinate Trace
data TraceP
TraceP :: !Type -> !Maybe Line -> ![Dimension] -> TraceP

-- | ParCoords
[$sel:type':TraceP] :: TraceP -> !Type

-- | Line Configuration
[$sel:line:TraceP] :: TraceP -> !Maybe Line

-- | Dimensions
[$sel:dimensions:TraceP] :: TraceP -> ![Dimension]

-- | Axis Dimension for Parallel Coordinate Plot
data Dimension
Dimension :: !Maybe [Int] -> !String -> ![Double] -> Dimension
[$sel:range:Dimension] :: Dimension -> !Maybe [Int]
[$sel:label:Dimension] :: Dimension -> !String
[$sel:values:Dimension] :: Dimension -> ![Double]

-- | Plot Type
data Type

-- | Scatter Plot
Scatter :: Type

-- | Histogram
Histogram :: Type

-- | Heatmap
Heatmap :: Type

-- | 3D Scatter
Scatter3D :: Type

-- | 3D Surface
Surface :: Type

-- | Parallel Coordinate Plot
ParCoords :: Type

-- | Scatter Mode
data Mode

-- | Draw Lines
Lines :: Mode

-- | Draw Markers only
Markers :: Mode

-- | Draw Both
LinesMarkers :: Mode

-- | Marker Symbols
data Symbol
Circle :: Symbol
CircleOpen :: Symbol
Cross :: Symbol
Diamond :: Symbol
DiamondOpen :: Symbol
Square :: Symbol
SquareOpen :: Symbol
X :: Symbol

-- | Color scales for Heamap / 3D Plots
data ColorScale
Blackbody :: ColorScale
Bluered :: ColorScale
Blues :: ColorScale
Cividis :: ColorScale
Earth :: ColorScale
Electric :: ColorScale
Greens :: ColorScale
Greys :: ColorScale
Hot :: ColorScale
Jet :: ColorScale
Picnic :: ColorScale
Portland :: ColorScale
Rainbow :: ColorScale
RdBu :: ColorScale
Reds :: ColorScale
Viridis :: ColorScale
YlGnBu :: ColorScale
YlOrRd :: ColorScale

-- | Bar Layout
data BarMode

-- | Stacked
Stack :: BarMode

-- | Grouped
Group :: BarMode

-- | Overlayed
Overlay :: BarMode

-- | Relative
Relative :: BarMode

-- | Bins in Histogram
data XBins
XBins :: !Double -> !Maybe Double -> !Maybe Double -> XBins

-- | Size of Bins
[$sel:size:XBins] :: XBins -> !Double

-- | Start of Bins
[$sel:start:XBins] :: XBins -> !Maybe Double

-- | End of Bins
[$sel:end:XBins] :: XBins -> !Maybe Double

-- | Generates line for <tt>data</tt> variable for <tt>N</tt> traces
traceData :: Int -> Script

-- | Generates line for <tt>i</tt>th <tt>trace</tt> variable
traceLine :: ToJSON a => a -> Int -> ByteString

-- | Converts layout and list of traces to <tt>Script</tt> for insertion
--   into HTML
toScript :: ToJSON a => Maybe Layout -> [a] -> ByteString

-- | Trace contructor, different order of arguments
mkTrace :: Maybe String -> Maybe Mode -> Maybe Marker -> Type -> BarMode -> XBins -> [Double] -> [Double] -> [Double] -> Trace

-- | Heatmap Trace constructor
mkTraceH :: ColorScale -> Bool -> Bool -> [String] -> [String] -> [[Double]] -> TraceH

-- | Heatmap Trace constructor
mkTraceS :: Maybe String -> ColorScale -> [Double] -> [Double] -> [[Double]] -> TraceS

-- | Parallel Coordinate Trace Constructor
mkTraceP :: ColorScale -> Bool -> Bool -> [Double] -> [String] -> [[Double]] -> TraceP

-- | Parallel Coordinate Trace Constructor without Line configuration
mkTraceP' :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> TraceP
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Margin
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.AxisType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Axis
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Axis
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Dimension
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Dimension
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Dimension
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Marker
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Marker
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Marker
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.ColorScale
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceS
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceH
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Line
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Line
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Line
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceP
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Layout
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Layout
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Layout
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.XBins
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.XBins
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.XBins
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Trace
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Trace
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Trace
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.BarMode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceP
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceH
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.TraceS
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Symbol
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Mode
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Type
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Graphics.Plotly.Internal.Axis


-- | Default Plot Configuration
module Graphics.Plotly.Default

-- | Trace Independent Plot Config
data PlotConfig
PlotConfig :: !String -> !String -> !String -> !AxisType -> !AxisType -> !BarMode -> !Mode -> !ColorScale -> !Bool -> !Bool -> !Bool -> !Int -> !Int -> !Margin -> !Marker -> !XBins -> PlotConfig

-- | Plot Title (default "")
[$sel:title':PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:xlabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | Y Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:ylabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:xmode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Y Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:ymode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Bar Mode (default Stack)
[$sel:barMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !BarMode

-- | Line Mode (default Linear)
[$sel:lineMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Mode

-- | Color Scale for 3D (default Viridis)
[$sel:colorScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !ColorScale

-- | Show Color Bar (default True)
[$sel:showScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Reverse the color scale (default False)
[$sel:reverseScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Show Legend (default True)
[$sel:legend:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Canvas Height in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:height:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Canvas Width in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:width:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Layout margin (default 66 66 66 66)
[$sel:margin:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Margin

-- | Marker (default 0.5 Circle 1.0)
[$sel:marker:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Marker

-- | Histogram bins (default 0.05 Nothing Nothing)
[$sel:bins:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !XBins

-- | Default <tt>PlotConfig</tt>
defaultConfig :: PlotConfig

-- | Config to Layout
fromConfig :: PlotConfig -> Layout
instance GHC.Show.Show Graphics.Plotly.Default.PlotConfig


-- | Plotly Plots in Haskell
module Graphics.Plotly

-- | Save Plot to HTML File
plot :: FilePath -> Script -> IO ()

-- | Scatter Plot with individual x values per trace
scatter' :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Scatter Plot with same x axis for all ys
scatter :: [String] -> [Double] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Histogram Plot
histogram :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Heatmap Plot
heatmap :: [String] -> [String] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | 3D Scatter Plot
scatter3d :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> [[Double]] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | 3D Surface Plot where X and Y are indices
surface'' :: [String] -> [[[Double]]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | 3D Surface Plot with same xs and ys for all zs
surface' :: [String] -> [Double] -> [Double] -> [[[Double]]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | 3D Surface Plot
surface :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> [[Double]] -> [[[Double]]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Parallel Coordinate Plot without line gradient
parcoord' :: [String] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Parallel Coordinate Plot with line gradient
parcoord :: [Double] -> [String] -> [[Double]] -> PlotConfig -> Script

-- | Internal Type Alias
type Script = ByteString

-- | Scatter Mode
data Mode

-- | Draw Lines
Lines :: Mode

-- | Draw Markers only
Markers :: Mode

-- | Draw Both
LinesMarkers :: Mode

-- | Plot Type
data Type

-- | Scatter Plot
Scatter :: Type

-- | Histogram
Histogram :: Type

-- | Heatmap
Heatmap :: Type

-- | 3D Scatter
Scatter3D :: Type

-- | 3D Surface
Surface :: Type

-- | Parallel Coordinate Plot
ParCoords :: Type

-- | Layout for Plots
data Layout
Layout :: !String -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe Axis -> !Maybe BarMode -> !Int -> !Int -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Margin -> Layout

-- | Plot Title
[$sel:title:Layout] :: Layout -> !String

-- | X Axis Layout
[$sel:xaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Y Axis Layout
[$sel:yaxis:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Axis

-- | Bar Chart Layout
[$sel:barmode:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe BarMode

-- | Plot Height in Pixels
[$sel:height:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Plot Width in Pixels
[$sel:width:Layout] :: Layout -> !Int

-- | Show a Legend
[$sel:showlegend:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Margins
[$sel:margin:Layout] :: Layout -> !Maybe Margin

-- | Bar Layout
data BarMode

-- | Stacked
Stack :: BarMode

-- | Grouped
Group :: BarMode

-- | Overlayed
Overlay :: BarMode

-- | Relative
Relative :: BarMode

-- | Axis Type
data AxisType

-- | Linear Axis (default)
Linear :: AxisType

-- | Logarithmic Axis
Log :: AxisType

-- | Date Axis
Date :: AxisType

-- | Categorical Axis
Category :: AxisType

-- | Multi Category Axis (?)
MultiCategory :: AxisType

-- | Color scales for Heamap / 3D Plots
data ColorScale
Blackbody :: ColorScale
Bluered :: ColorScale
Blues :: ColorScale
Cividis :: ColorScale
Earth :: ColorScale
Electric :: ColorScale
Greens :: ColorScale
Greys :: ColorScale
Hot :: ColorScale
Jet :: ColorScale
Picnic :: ColorScale
Portland :: ColorScale
Rainbow :: ColorScale
RdBu :: ColorScale
Reds :: ColorScale
Viridis :: ColorScale
YlGnBu :: ColorScale
YlOrRd :: ColorScale

-- | Marker Symbols
data Symbol
Circle :: Symbol
CircleOpen :: Symbol
Cross :: Symbol
Diamond :: Symbol
DiamondOpen :: Symbol
Square :: Symbol
SquareOpen :: Symbol
X :: Symbol

-- | Parallel Coordinate Lines
data Line
Line :: !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe Bool -> !Maybe ColorScale -> ![Double] -> Line

-- | Show Color Bar
[$sel:showscale:Line] :: Line -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Reverse the Color Scale
[$sel:reversescale:Line] :: Line -> !Maybe Bool

-- | Color Scale
[$sel:colorscale:Line] :: Line -> !Maybe ColorScale

-- | Values represnting the color
[$sel:color:Line] :: Line -> ![Double]

-- | Layout Margins
data Margin
Margin :: !Int -> !Int -> !Int -> !Int -> Margin

-- | Left Margin
[$sel:l:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Right Margin
[$sel:r:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Bottom Margin
[$sel:b:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Top Margin
[$sel:t:Margin] :: Margin -> !Int

-- | Trace Independent Plot Config
data PlotConfig
PlotConfig :: !String -> !String -> !String -> !AxisType -> !AxisType -> !BarMode -> !Mode -> !ColorScale -> !Bool -> !Bool -> !Bool -> !Int -> !Int -> !Margin -> !Marker -> !XBins -> PlotConfig

-- | Plot Title (default "")
[$sel:title':PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:xlabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | Y Axis Label (default "")
[$sel:ylabel:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !String

-- | X Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:xmode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Y Axis Type (default Linear)
[$sel:ymode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !AxisType

-- | Bar Mode (default Stack)
[$sel:barMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !BarMode

-- | Line Mode (default Linear)
[$sel:lineMode:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Mode

-- | Color Scale for 3D (default Viridis)
[$sel:colorScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !ColorScale

-- | Show Color Bar (default True)
[$sel:showScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Reverse the color scale (default False)
[$sel:reverseScale:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Show Legend (default True)
[$sel:legend:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Bool

-- | Canvas Height in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:height:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Canvas Width in Pixels (default 800)
[$sel:width:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Int

-- | Layout margin (default 66 66 66 66)
[$sel:margin:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Margin

-- | Marker (default 0.5 Circle 1.0)
[$sel:marker:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !Marker

-- | Histogram bins (default 0.05 Nothing Nothing)
[$sel:bins:PlotConfig] :: PlotConfig -> !XBins

-- | Default <tt>PlotConfig</tt>
defaultConfig :: PlotConfig


-- | Examples for using plotly-hs
module Graphics.Plotly.Example

-- | Put All plots in the plots directory
plotPath :: String -> FilePath

-- | 2D Scatter Plot as seen here:
--   <a>https://plotly.com/javascript/line-charts/#basic-line-plot</a>
scatterExample :: IO ()

-- | Histogram / Bar chart Example
histExample :: IO ()
heatmapExample :: IO ()

-- | 3D Scatter Plot Example
scatter3dExample :: IO ()

-- | 3D Surface Plot Example
surfaceExample :: IO ()

-- | Parallel Coordinate Plot Example
parcoordsExample :: IO ()
